items.content_html: Music Event Website Backend (Node.js, MongoDB) API-driven backend for a music event website. Manages: Event data (artists, dates, locations) User accounts (optional: ticketing & authentication) Secure communication with the frontend Lightweight & Flexible: Ideal for fast development and scaling.
items.title: Team-Jambo/Jambo_run: Music Event Website Backend (Node.js, MongoDB) API-driven backend for a music event website. Manages:  Event data (artists, dates, locations) User accounts (optional: ticketing & authentication) Secure communication with the frontend Lightweight & Flexible: Ideal for fast development and scaling.

items.content_html: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.
items.title: DuckySoLucky/hypixel-discord-chat-bridge: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.

items.content_html: Language Switcher (vls) is a lightweight gutenberg block module designed to facilitate language and region selection on your website. It provides a user-friendly modal window for users to choose their preferred language and region, seamlessly redirecting them to the selected content.
items.title: VSG-EMEA/vsge-language-switcher: Language Switcher (vls) is a lightweight gutenberg block module designed to facilitate language and region selection on your website. It provides a user-friendly modal window for users to choose their preferred language and region, seamlessly redirecting them to the selected content.
